import pandas as pd
from pathlib import Path
source = Path('../../02_RAW/2020_02_03_iris_versicolor/2020_02_03_iris_versicolor.parquet')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = pd.read_parquet(source)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df= df[df['species_id']<3]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df.to_parquet('2020_02_04_iris_versicolor.parquet')
{% endraw %}
